An LLM (Large Language Model) is an AI system trained on vast amounts of textual data using deep learning and transformer architectures to understand and generate human-like language. The LLM API Pricing Calculator is a tool designed to help users estimate the cost of using various Large Language Model APIs, embeddings and Fine-tuning based on their specific usage needs. The pricing estimates are based on the latest publicly available pricing information from the API providers. The calculator will provide a combined comparison of the estimated costs.", "score": 0.7316155, "raw_content": null}, {"url": "https://tech.co/news/grok-ai-pricing", "title": "Grok AI Pricing: How Much Does Grok Cost in 2025? - Tech.co", "content": "Grok, the brainchild of Elon Musk’s xAI, is a bit of an oddball in the generative AI world thanks to its irreverent personality and real-time access to X’s social media data. * The full version of Grok AI is accessible through X Premium subscriptions, with plans starting at $8 per month. Both tiers provide advanced access to Grok AI, but Premium+ offers a fully ad-free experience on X and faster access to new features. As xAI continues to actively develop and update Grok’s source code, base model weights, and capabilities, it could close the gap with more established AI models such as ChatGPT and Gemini. summary: Grok AI's pricing is accessible through X Premium subscriptions, starting at $8 per month (Tech.co). The full version of Grok AI is available through these subscriptions. An LLM API Pricing Calculator (yourgpt.ai, helicone.ai) helps estimate costs for various LLM APIs.
